p: The fluorescence intensity of syringic acid, p-coumaric acid, and cirsimaritin was 97.4 ± 20.8%, 98.8 ± 13.7%, and 87.1 ± 4.3%, respectively, and among them, p-coumaric acid has the most significant ability to improve glucose uptake, which can increase by about 22%, compared with the TNF- α group ( P < 0.05; Figure 4).
